item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, March 4, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Use Firefox in 2025 (30 points | 21 comments)
2. Apple's Software Quality Crisis: When Premium Hardware Meets Subpar Software (79 points | 87 comments)
3. VT220 font emulation in browser (16 points | 5 comments)
4. Why Can’t We Screenshot Frames From DRM-Protected Video on Apple Devices? (30 points | 14 comments)
5. Do not run any Cargo commands on untrusted projects (9 points | 6 comments)
6. Some things that make Rust lifetimes hard to learn (22 points | 13 comments)
7. Making Flow – Interview with director Gints Zilbalodis — (8 points | 1 comment)
8. The Fibrovisor: Turning a dollar store fibre optic wand into a low resolution display (16 points | no comments)
9. How fast can you open 1000 files? (20 points | 9 comments)
10. You Need Much Less Memory than Time (9 points | 3 comments)
11. The power of interning: making a time series database 2000x smaller in Rust (11 points | 1 comment)
12. globstar — open-source static analysis toolkit for writing code checkers in YAML and GO (4 points | 1 comment)
13. Tangled — a git collaboration platform built on atproto (53 points | 19 comments)
14. The Botfly Test: Characterizing parasitic automated behavior in online communities (12 points | 2 comments)
15. illuminant - ActivityPub server with NNTP interface (32 points | 6 comments)
16. HATETRIS - Obsession, Friendship, and World Records (12 points | 2 comments)
17. smallpond: A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (2 points | no comments)
18. The Empty Promise of AI-Generated Creativity (12 points | 9 comments)
19. A float walks into a gradual type system (14 points | 5 comments)
20. When declarative systems break (3 points | 2 comments)
21. Exploiting Python pickles (2 points | no comments)
22. See yourself, at runtime (12 points | no comments)
23. polars’ Rgonomic Patterns (7 points | 1 comment)
24. Yoke is really cool (34 points | 26 comments)
25. Begrudgingly choosing CBOR over MessagePack (34 points | 33 comments)
item.guid: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, March 4, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
